topics.title: Array Map
topics.description: Transforms an array by applying a function to each element.
topics.code:
const nums = [1,2,3];
const doubled = nums.map(n => n * 2);

topics.title: Filter Array
topics.description: Filters elements based on a condition.
topics.code:
const nums = [1,2,3,4];
const evens = nums.filter(n => n % 2 === 0);
